Questo legame peroÌ si rompe quando Bruno incontra Arianna, leader di un gruppo rock che gli propone di entrare nella sua band.
synopsis.english: In the 90s, Isabella was eighteen and a star. 20 years later, she is still singing those same songs in small town bars with her son Bruno, playing guitar. It's because of him that her career stopped. At least it's what she tells herself.
